Package game.dinosaur

Class CarnivoreDinosaur

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.dinosaur.Dinosaur
game.dinosaur.CarnivoreDinosaur
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Allosaur, Pterodactyl
public abstract class CarnivoreDinosaur
extends Dinosaur
Represents a Carnivore dinosaur. Has a hashmap to check all the dinosaurs it has attacked.
Since:
25/04/2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
NgYuKang
See Also:
DinosaurStatus, Gender, Dinosaur

  • Constructor Details

    • CarnivoreDinosaur

      public CarnivoreDinosaur​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints, java.lang.Enum<Gender> gender, int thirstMax)
      Constructor for an adult Carnivore Dinosaur.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the dinosaur.
      displayChar - Character used to represent the dinosaur on the map.
      hitPoints - Max HP of the dinosaur.
      gender - Gender of the dinosaur.
      thirstMax - Maximum thirst the dinosaur should have

      the Enum that allows this Dinosaur to attack another Dinosaur

    • getAllowableActions

      public Actions getAllowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
      Generates action that other actors can do to this carnivore dinosaur
      Overrides:
      getAllowableActions in class Dinosaur
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the Actor that might be performing attack
      direction - String representing the direction of the other Actor
      map - current GameMap
      Returns:
      actions that the other actor can do to a carnivore dinosaur.

    • canAttack

      Parameters:
      target - the Dinosaur to check
      Returns:

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Lets a CarnivoreDinosaur have its turn. Will iterate through the entire hashmap to make update how long since last attack on a dinosaur it has attacked
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Dinosaur
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      Action to take during this turn, defaults to DoNothingAction if can't find any.
